website_summaries.verdict: Some quirks are possible, but otherwise you will enjoy this model's size, display, and streaming capabilities.
pros: Boasts a 50-inch screen that works well for most rooms without being too small or taking up excessive space
Built-in Roku makes streaming fast and easy
Has realistic colors and sharp contrasts

website_summaries.verdict: The RCA Roku TV falls short on contrast, but otherwise offers accurate colors and plenty of streaming services for a very affordable price.
pros: Plenty of apps and services with Roku TV
cons: While accurate, colors don't reach past broadcast standards

customer_reviews.title: Picture and interface are great. Roku functions are built in
customer_reviews.text: Picture and interface are great. Roku functions are built in, not on a separate stick like some other reviews suggest. Audio is terrible. Likely going to contact RCA when I get a chance to maybe get that resolved. Unsure if the audio on this model is terrible or if this one is just jacked.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: The picture is great, sound quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: This tv is all I could ask for. The picture is great, sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Syrenity

customer_reviews.title: love the Roku and tv connection and the look of ...
customer_reviews.text: love the Roku and tv connection and the look of the TV itself.t
customer_reviews.author: pen productions

customer_reviews.title: Good picture & sound
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my husband as a Christmas gift he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Almost as bad as the firestick remote
customer_reviews.text: The remote doesn't have a volume button. I'm still trying to figure this damn thing out. They took away all the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my granddaughter. She says she loves it. I think this is a good review from a 12 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it works great I wish I could of found ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it works great I wish I could of found a TCL ROKU But it works great for bedroom
customer_reviews.author: lois kingsland

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tv. Watching Netflix on it as I write this review. A decent tv overall.
customer_reviews.author: LuchiChelsea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thought the roku was built in but the stick is fine
customer_reviews.author: Quinn

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Tv . its such a clear picture . everything so far is great about this Tv
customer_reviews.author: Kortasia Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!!!!!! The colors very clear and natural. Very easy assembly. I'am thinking to bay another one.
customer_reviews.author: Pet’s Lover

customer_reviews.title: Excellant purchase, only thing that I have trouble with ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellant purchase, only thing that I have trouble with is programing another remote to work with Proscan TV. Can not find the code for Proscan.
customer_reviews.author: Keith W. Zollars

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: The TV came when you said it would and that was great thank you. However the free Roku stick that we should have gotten with the remote also was not included. Please send ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Malak

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The television was a gift. It was easy to set up. It has good sound and a good picture . It has not been used very much but I think it is a good television .
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Smart tv os mot a smart
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Smart tv os mot a smart tv
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra simmons

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not what was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This was not the "smart" tv that was advertised. It is a cheap tv that comes with a Roku devise to be inserted.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya Lee-Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Good picture
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, and easy to operate. However the remote has volume on the side, and you end up hitting it when picking up the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Can’t find Directv Remote Code
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for months, but I cannot find the correct tv code to use to program the TV with the Directv remote. I have no complaints other than that. I think it’s a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't believe how easy the set up was for this. Was worried that it was not WIFI easy, but every everything worked like a charm. The price was so low it had me worried. Not a single hitch in anything. It is as easy as advertised. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: cole

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I think its highly underrated
customer_reviews.text: I have this TV. I love it. I think its highly underrated. My only concern is what will Roku be in 5 years. But its not expensive so I will just adjust to whatever occurs. You have to update the software when you get it which is easy, not difficult; its just a matter of pushing a couple buttons. I has a great sleep feature that I use all the time. Great deal, great TV.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L. Kletter

customer_reviews.title: Old Roku Stick.
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture, but the Roku stick included is 3 generations old. It took over an hour on the phone with Netflix just to get it to log in, then we find out it doesn't support profiles because it's so old. Ended up having to purchase a newer Roku stick and eat the $40 more.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy & Tracy H.

customer_reviews.title: WARNING! Terrible TV, Roku is brutal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV somewhere else but I wanted to warn people about this piece of trash. Roku is just garbage, unbelievably restrictive with terrible apps. Spend the extra $50 & get a real smart TV. I plugged a 2TB hard drive with a bunch of shows & movies & the TV wouldn’t play 3/4 of them while my Samsung plays them all. Who designed this piece of junk? The picture quality is not as good as I expected with 4K RCA used to be good quality, that’s certainly not the case anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Davy W

customer_reviews.title: Bought a RCA product which failed during the warranty period ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a RCA product which failed during the warranty period. Cannot get the company to respond. Be warned, their products fail and then you're stuck.
customer_reviews.author: MusicMan

customer_reviews.title: Initially good even with bad sound, lasted barely over a year with minimal usage...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't buy from amazon, but I got it on sale for $179. Initially I thought it was a good deal, other than the sound being very bad. I've had it about 14 months and only used it maybe once a month (it's in my office, normally on the computer). Turned it on today and the tv is dead. If it had lasted 3 years it would have been worth the price, but considering it barely lasted a year with minimal usage and I've seen quite a few other reviews where it only lasted a year. I wouldn't recommend this tv to anyone...
customer_reviews.author: Clinton L. Yarborough Jr.

customer_reviews.title: RCA Let my Down should have bought the warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV early in October 2019 sorry to say back has gone out that equals sound but no picture just what I get for trying to go cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Roy  Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good TV.
customer_reviews.text: Good TV for the price. Sound and picture were really good. Bough it for my 7 year old daughters room. However, my daughter broke her remote control. Now I'm trying to find a universal remote that will operate the TV. Cannot get to the Roku TV without the remote. Tried using the TV options and it did not work. Unless something else is wrong that I'm unaware of. I'll keep you posted.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Will last only year.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible tv. We have had 3 break on us. I would never buy anything from RCA. They are impossible get a hold of and they make low quality products. Buy the warranty if you decide you’re taking a chance on it.
customer_reviews.author: David Maine

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied with this tv
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this tv, only had it a month and I like it. The reason I bought this tv is I bought a 42 in tv over 15 yrs ago and is still working today. So we see if this one stands up to the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a "smart" tv
customer_reviews.text: I'm offended that this machine is referred to as a "smart TV" when it has no built-in network technology. It simply includes a separate Roku which will consume an HDMI port.
customer_reviews.author: Island Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Have the product. Screen went out a little over ...
customer_reviews.text: Have the product. Screen went out a little over a year and out of warranty. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous
